text: So from what I gathered from Homy today here's how he wants us to do the assignment:
1. Give him one user story, plus template and test case to go with it each week.
2. He approves it, or gives us pointers on how to improve our plan.
3. We then implement it and then show him the result of our implementation the following week, along with another user story/template/test case for the next function we plan to tackle.

So this week I think we can focus on implementing login. <@U4F33615G> do the wireframe for login, and homepage too since we need to get that out of the way. <@U4FP56WS2> just do test cases for login. Invalid login, valid login, login with remembering, login without remembering.
Done home, register&blog in already, will send two version to the trello tonight
